synopsis.text: One day, the socially awkward Koyomi Takasaki, who lives with his mother after his parents' divorce, encounters a peculiar situation. Attending a college prep school where academic focus overshadows social interactions, Koyomi struggles to make friends. However, his life takes a turn when his classmate, Kazune Takigawa, approaches him with an astonishing revelation. Kazune claims to hail from World Line 85, a parallel universe in which the two of them share a romantic relationship. In a world where inter-dimensional travel is commonplace, could it be that Koyomi himself is a visitor from another reality?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
